########################################################################
# Include python install macros
########################################################################
include(GrPython)
if(NOT PYTHONINTERP_FOUND)
    return()
endif()

add_subdirectory(bindings)

########################################################################
# Install python sources
########################################################################
GR_PYTHON_INSTALL(
    FILES
    __init__.py
    OWC_Channel_relative_python.py
    OOK_Modulator_Python.py
    OOK_Demodulator_Python.py
    OWC_Channel_absolute_python.py DESTINATION ${GR_PYTHON_DIR}/gnuradio/owc
)

########################################################################
# Handle the unit tests
########################################################################
include(GrTest)

set(GR_TEST_TARGET_DEPS gnuradio-owc)

# Create a package directory that tests can import. It includes everything
# from `python/`.
add_custom_target(
  copy_module_for_tests ALL
  COMMAND ${CMAKE_COMMAND} -E copy_directory ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
          ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/test_modules/gnuradio/owc/
)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_OWC_Channel_relative_python ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_OWC_Channel_relative_python.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_OWC_Channel_relative_cplus ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_OWC_Channel_relative_cplus.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_OWC_Channel_relative_cpvolk ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_OWC_Channel_relative_cpvolk.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_OOK_Modulator_Python ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_OOK_Modulator_Python.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_OOK_Modulator_cplus ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_OOK_Modulator_cplus.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_OOK_Demodulator_Python ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_OOK_Demodulator_Python.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_OOK_Demodulator_cplus ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_OOK_Demodulator_cplus.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_OOK_Demodulator_cpvolk ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_OOK_Demodulator_cpvolk.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_OWC_Channel_absolute_cplus ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_OWC_Channel_absolute_cplus.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_OWC_Channel_absolute_cvolk ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_OWC_Channel_absolute_cvolk.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_OWC_Channel_absolute_python ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_OWC_Channel_absolute_python.py)
